body.name: KAOTPO Instant Water Warmer for Baby Formula, Glass Baby Warm Water Dispenser with 1~12 OZ Quantitative Warm Water Value & 100 Temperature Controls, Baby Water Warmer Dispenser with Glass Tank 2.5L
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 4 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Smart Baby Warm Water Dispenser】 The baby warm water dispenser is easy to use. Replacing traditional bottle warmers, it can intantly provide you with the right amount and temperature of baby formula warm water. No longer have to wait in baby tears, allowing new moms to say goodbye to the troubles of being busy and flustered.

【Adjustable Temperature & Water Outlet Volume】 Built-in smart and precise chips. The baby warm water dispenser has a temperature adjustment range of 95~194℉. It also can achieve precise water volume control with an adjustment range of 1 to 12 US fl oz. Save a lot of formula making time and achieve more scientific formula feeding.

【Onekey Boiling & Keep Warm 24/7】 According to the recommendation of the WHO, the warm water for baby formula maker should be boiled first. After one-click boiling, the baby warm water in the glass tank will be keep warm 24/7 to your settings. Prepare healthier warm water for baby formula.

【More Safer Materials】The glass tank of the baby water dispenser uses borosilicate glass and food-grade SUS316 stainless steel as containers. The water outlet pipe is made of BPA-free PP. Refusing to heat baby formula warm water in plastic containers for a long time is our responsibility to you and your baby.

【Thoughtful Gift for New Moms】The instant baby warm water dispenser is powerful and easy-to-operate. It can reduce the problems you may encounter when feeding with formula. Especially suitable for new moms and families with multiple babies.It is the best gift you can find to celebrate the arrival of a newborn.

Previous page 1~12 US Fl Oz Quantitative Settings Available Easy and convenient, just One-click to get right amount of warm water. Automatic temperature detection of 120 per second Keep warm 24/7, temperature error ≤ ± 1 ℉ Boiled water is safer for your baby According to WHO's recommendation, baby formula water should be boiled first A drinking water solution suitable for your family Not only baby formula, but also mother's honey water, father's coffee, and grandfather's tea... Next page 1 Quantitative setting 2 Keep warm 3 One-click boiling 4 Multipurpose

WE CARE WHAT YOU CARE More Safe Materials Refuse to use plastic tank for heating and store baby's warm water for a long time. More Security Designs Prevent dry burning、Built-in power off memory and self-diagnostic function,reducing the burden on mothers instead of creating new troubles.

Realize more scientific bottle feeding Built-in water amount fine-tuning program This function ensures more accurate water distribution,and make it compatible with American standard liquid capacity bottles, British standard bottles,and other containers with varied capacity requirements. (Please refer to the manual or the 2nd video on the listing)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This machine is a dream!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to get it at first because although the reviews were good, they weren’t a lot of reviews. I’m so glad I did. If you feed your baby with powdered formula, this is a must have ! It works perfectly just as it says it does. It makes things so much easier and less stressful. The perfect amount of water at the right temperature every time, so easy, I love this machine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: We tried a lot of water warmer for babies but this is the best one so far,you can choose the temperature as u want and u can choose how many oz of water you need. The water tank is made up of glass and that's why I really liked this product n highly recommend to buy this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I bought this because it made getting bottles at night faster. While it does pour the tiniest bit over the oz we need we just pour the extra back in the container with no hassle. We definitely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You must have it!!!
reviews.reviewText: This product made with good material, great function and save my time making baby formula!No more cry to wait heating the milk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not dispense accurate amount and temp not accurate
reviews.reviewText: I noticed water does not dispense the correct amount. I’ll put 3 oz and it’ll dispense 2 1/2. Ive tried turning it off and everytime I restart it it’ll dispense something different, I’ll put 3 oz again and it’ll dispense 2. I’ve put to dispense 9 oz and it will only dispense 8 or sometimes 71/2 or something 81/2 it’s always something different. The only accurate oz that it will dispense is 4 oz which is weird. Also, I had to run about 3-4 full cycles of the water glass pitcher to get the smell out of plastic. I’ll see if I can contact someone if there is something I can do to fix this.Update: it also doesn’t always dispense the correct temperature. Everytime I make a bottle I have to make sure it’s drinkable. I’ll have it at 116 temp because higher than that it gets too hot and lower than that it’s luke warm but then when I check water is at 118 or 120, not accurate. I will be returning it. Sucks because I love that it’s so easy and fast to use. Really wish I didn’t have to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could make the bottle with eyes close
reviews.reviewText: I have soft silicon milk bottles that are hard to see the measurements. Love this machine makes it even easier to perfect oz and temperature-making bottles day or night time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it already
reviews.reviewText: Just got this and I love it. It's very pretty on my counter and modern. I wanted a glass water warmer for my baby’s bottles, not the plastic one’s I keep seeing. I don't like the idea of a plastic container keeping water warm all day- so I saw this and wanted to try. Its very well made and aesthetic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
